item.title: Android Installing system update
budget software
item.description: 22:52 Tuesday 17 October 2017 JST I looked at a few different options and seem to have settled on Mobills

item.title: started an Android app
item.description: 12:28 Monday 24 October 2016 JST So far I’ve just got a Hello World app running, along with a single image pulled in via Fresco. Hopefully I can get scp working to send my local images to my server.
